item.title: Claire add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "O Stunden in der Kindheit, da hinter den Figuren mehr als nur Vergangnes war und vor uns nicht die Zukunft." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Claire add a quote by Jim Carroll
item.description: "Conscience is no more than the dead speaking to us." -- Jim Carroll

item.title: Claire add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Claire add a quote by Franz Wright
item.description: "literature will lose, sunlight will win, don't worry." -- Franz Wright

item.title: Claire add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "I never had intimate friends, and the few who came close are in New York. By which I mean they're dead, because that's where I suppose condemned souls go in order not to endure the truth of their past lives." -- Gabriel García Márquez
